text: Shoppers World or Shopper's World may refer to: ;in Canada * Shoppers World Brampton, in Brampton, Ontario, Canada ** Shoppers World Terminal , a Brampton Transit bus station * Shoppers World Danforth and Shoppers World Albion (now the Albion Centre), in Toronto, Ontario, Canada ;in the United States * Shopper's World, a strip mall on the site of Shoppers' World, one of the first suburban malls in the U.S. * Shoppers World (retail chain), a chain of discount department stores.
title: Shoppers World
